subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- A U.S. CH-47 Chinook helicopter crashes in Afghanistan, killing seven people, NATO officials tell CNN, adding a rescue team was ambushed.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

>+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=+=
Former first lady Nancy Reagan spends a rare emotional hour with
Larry King.  She discusses the just-published Ronald Reagan
diaries and the intimate secrets they reveal about the president
who adored her. Watch "Larry King Live" tomorrow at 9 p.m. ET.
http://www.cnn.com/larryking
